column1: variable,question_text,description,type,values
consent,"I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.","Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.","categorical","Yes"
prolific_id,"Please enter your Prolific ID (this is required to receive payment).","Unique Prolific participant identifier.","text","Free text"

work_status,"Which of the following best describes your current work status?","Participant employment status.","categorical","Full-time; Part-time; Self-employed; Freelance; Student; Unemployed; Other"

ai_tools_use,"Do you use any AI-powered tools or features in your work or daily life? (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search)","Whether participant uses AI tools.","categorical","Yes; No"

ai_tools_frequency,"How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?","Frequency of AI tool or digital tool use.","categorical","Never; Rarely; Occasionally; Weekly; Daily; Multiple times/day"
ai_emotion_influence,"Using AI tools influences my emotional state.","Extent to which AI use affects emotional state.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_emotion_flat_after_use,"I sometimes feel emotionally flat or neutral after using AI-powered tools.","Emotional flatness after AI use.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_emotion_drained_after_use,"I feel more emotionally drained after long or repeated use of AI tools.","Emotional fatigue caused by AI usage.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_emotion_relief_support,"AI tools sometimes give me a sense of relief or support when I feel overloaded.","AI as a source of relief or emotional support.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_emotion_mood_shift,"My mood can shift quickly during or after using AI tools and chats.","Mood variability associated with AI use.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_identity_influence,"Using AI-powered tools influences how I see myself and my abilities.","Impact of AI use on identity and self-view.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_identity_mine_vs_ai,"I sometimes question what is genuinely 'mine' versus shaped by suggestions from AI tools.","Concerns about AI shaping personal thoughts.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_identity_authenticity_work,"AI tools affect how authentic my work or ideas feel.","Authenticity concerns regarding AI-influenced work.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_identity_less_connected_self,"I sometimes feel less connected to my real self when I rely heavily on AI tools.","Feeling less connected to self when using AI.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_identity_blur_weaken,"I worry that regular use of AI systems may blur or weaken parts of my identity.","Identity erosion concerns tied to AI use.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_creativity_influence,"AI tools influence how creative I feel.","Impact of AI on creative sense.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_creativity_spark_ideas,"I rely on AI tools to spark ideas or creative directions.","AI as source of creative stimulus.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_creativity_less_original,"My creative work feels less original when AI tools are involved.","Originality concerns about AI-assisted creativity.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_creativity_clearer_expression,"AI tools help me express ideas more clearly or fluidly.","AI improves clarity or expression.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_creativity_less_meaningful,"AI tools make creative work easier but sometimes less meaningful.","Meaningfulness impact of AI on creative work.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_thinking_influence,"AI systems influence the way I think internally.","Internal cognitive influence of AI.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_thinking_depth_engagement,"They affect how deeply I engage with my own thoughts.","AI impacts depth of thinking.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_thinking_focus_attention,"They shape what I focus on or pay attention to.","AI influences focus and attention direction.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_thinking_process_problems,"They influence how I process problems or decisions.","AI affects problem-processing style.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_thinking_meaning_purpose,"AI systems affect my sense of meaning or purpose in some tasks.","AI influences task meaning and purpose.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_validation_check_thoughts,"I use AI tools to check whether my thoughts or opinions are correct.","AI used as validation mechanism.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_validation_reinforce_beliefs,"I use AI tools in ways that reinforce my existing beliefs about a topic.","Belief reinforcement using AI.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_validation_evaluate_thinking,"I rely on AI tools to help me evaluate or question my thinking.","AI used for thinking evaluation.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"

ai_validation_rather_than_alternatives,"I rely on digital tools or AI to validate my thinking rather than explore alternative perspectives.","Narrowing perspective due to AI use.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_meaning_tasks_feel,"AI tools influence how meaningful certain tasks or activities feel.","Perceived task meaningfulness influenced by AI.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
ai_values_less_connected,"Relying on AI systems can make me feel less connected to my core values.","Values-alignment concerns.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"

ai_authenticity_think_work_express,"AI systems sometimes affect my sense of authenticity in how I think, work, or express myself.","Authenticity concerns regarding thinking and expression.","numeric","Likert 1-“7"
open_text_ai_effects_on_emotions,"How have AI tools influenced your emotions or inner experience?","Open-text emotional effects of AI.","text","Free text"
open_text_ai_effects_on_creativity,"How have AI tools influenced your creativity or originality?","Open-text creativity effects of AI.","text","Free text"
age_group,"What is your age group?","Age category.","categorical","18-“24; 25-“34; 35-“44; 45-“54; 55-“65; 65+"
country,"Country of residence.","Country participant lives in.","categorical","UK; US; Canada; Australia; New Zealand; Ireland; Other"
gender,"Which of the following best describes your gender?","Participant gender identity.","categorical","Man; Woman; Non-binary; Prefer not to say; Other"
